channel.title: Help a noob will ya
channel.description: hi im quite new to all this kind of stuff and im qute young too so go easy im using the Blindscape thing from here http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=432858.40 and i would like to know how to place NPCs into the game ive downloaded the Autospawn.cfg that is full and replaced it but no npcs come up id like to know if im doing anything wrong pls help me

item.title: Help a noob will ya
item.dc:creator: @attk_mast3r attk mast3r
item.description:
@attk_mast3r wrote:

autospawn.cfg is the file you want the code should look something like this:

spawn = #### [tab]@@@@[tab]%%%%[tab]0[tab]0[tab]0[tab]0[tab]0[tab]1[tab]descrption

= npc id @@@@ = x coordinate %%%% = y coordinate

here are the guidelines: //------NpcID—CoordX–CoordY–Height–RangeX1-RangeY1-RangeX2-RangeY2-WalkType-Descrption

the rangeX1 and all that is the restricted area where it can walk and the walk type can be expressed as 1 and 2
1 meaning stationary (dosn’t walk) 2 meaning walk

Read full topic
